message.entry: Supported GPU not found. Update the 'ExecutionEnvironment' on trainingOptions to 'cpu'. Or, to automatically determine if a GPU is available, use 'auto'.
The classNames must be one of the following types: cell array of char vectors, string array or a categorical array.
The intrinsics must be an n-by-1 column vector.
All inputs must have the same batch size.
Input image and depth image must have the same spatial dimensions.
The input image to predictPose must be a single channel or 3-channel RGB image, or a batch of images.
The input depth image to predictPose must be a single channel image, or a batch of images.
The input size must be a 1-by-3 vector with the third element equal to 3.
